name: But... Skunks!?
description:
Residents of Shady Acres Condominiums expected to find all the latest amenities in their new homes. The developers had promised them every modern convenience. 

But... Skunks!?

(In this rhythm game, one or two players will act as forces of entropy that introduce disorder and randomness into a controlled environment.)

Created for OST Jam Vol. 2 — the soundtrack to this game is "Actual Warfare" by Inkedsplat.
